topic.title: HPE Helion OpenStack 1.0: Manage Overcloud Configuration

body.p: The overcloud options define the configurations of the overcloud. You can define the configurations for ESX Clusters, StoreVirtual Backends, and StoreServ Backends.

ol.li: Log in to the undercloud Horizon Dashboard.
In the left panel, click the Overcloud tab.
Select the desired tab on the Configure Cloud page:ESX Clusters, StoreVirtual Backends and StoreServ Backends.
